name: into the cabal
description:
a librarian is granted the quest to restore a forgotten sanctuary

controls are as follows:

movement - WASD (keyboard)
looking around: Mouse
pick up/use items: E

note for photosensitive epileptics: some flashing occurs!

(you can also fullscreen it with ALT+ENTER)

entry for LD:  https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/into-the-cabal
source: https://github.com/profan/ld-48-into-the-cabal
